cpu.description: The amount of CPU (in milli-cores) that should be reserved.

max_pods.description: The maximum number of pods that should be scheduled.

memory.description: The amount of memory (in Mi) that should be reserved.

region.description: The region to query instance information from.

storage.description: The amount of storage (in Gi) that should be reserved.

block.description: `aws-eks-helper_kube_reserved` data source can be used to retrieve resources that should be reserved by Kubernetes for a given instance type.
